sense.def:
A bang
je glasen zvok, na primer pri eksploziji.

seg.quote: She slammed the drawer shut with a bang.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
to bang a door
ali
a door bangs
povemo, da se vrata silovito in z glasnim treskom zaprejo.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To bang on something
ali
to bang something
pomeni po nečem udariti tako močno, da glasno zabobni.

To bang part of one's body against something
pomeni, da s telesom po naključju ob nekaj udarimo in se poškodujemo.

seg.quote: I bang my head against it every time.
Did you suffer any bangs or bumps?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
goes with a bang
, je zelo uspešno.

Kadar je nekaj
bang in a particular position
, je natanko v tistem položaju.

seg.quote: Emory University is bang in the middle of Atlanta.
